comments.body: In `ValidateUpdate` and `PrepareForUpdate` these are `newObj, oldObj`, right?
`obj, old`... the order is all I really care about
kind is deducible from resource and vice versa-- do you really need to make everyone pass both?

I think I can make an argument to provide Resource, Kind, and APIVersion in the long run.

Since the AttributesRecord is only constructed in the 4 places, I don't think the extra argument is a major concern.  The Attributes interface makes the consumer side easy enough I think.
